state_analysis: The GLPK Integer Optimizer is still running, indicated by the ongoing output related to the integer optimization process. The command to extract the objective value has not yet been executed successfully due to the absence of the solution file.
explanation: We will continue to allow the GLPK optimizer to finish executing. Once it completes and produces the 'solution.txt' file, we can then run the command to extract the integer part of the objective value from that file.
